topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5585b9ce6368725c17001c52#post_5585b9ce6368725c17001c52
Their gravity is so dense that only one particle of virtual particle pairs can escape and only energy can bleed out.  The way that it kills you is that rips you to shreds and then your energy is stuck there for all eternity.

If the new theory is true then death by black hole is literally the worst way to die in the universe, cause if you were to run into a ultra large black hole you wouldn't die; rather what would happen to you is that you would get sucked in and flattened and chances are you wouldn't die.  Imagine being flattened for all eternity unable to die.

Tl:dr; if you were in space and going to die by a black hole put a bullet to your brain instead, cause that would be even worse than death.

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5585bca46368725c17002147#post_5585bca46368725c17002147
IF the new theory is true then hell *LITERALLY* exists cause if you were to touch a black hole what would essentially happen to you is that you wouldn't die, you would just forever be trapped in a realm that you literally can not understand, can't speak, can't see, can't move in, essentially just trapped inside your mind for all of eternity AND CONCIOUS.

If the earth was to be swallowed up by a black hole the smart thing to do would be to just kill yourself cause jesus christ that would be terrifying.



Call me crazy, but personally I think the reason why we haven't found aliens yet is that space is so hostile that we're incredibly lucky to not have been destroyed yet.  Considering that there's been five mass extinctions in our history we're just fucking lucky to not have been wiped out.

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5585bdbb6368726eaa0004b6#post_5585bdbb6368726eaa0004b6
You know what is actually a good thing about how the usa's sex statistics are changing?

What is currently happening sex wise in the usa is the teenage pregnancy is going down and as a result so are abortions cause people are waiting until their 30's now to have children cause people are starting to realize "I'm not financially ready for children yet!"  If teenage pregnancy starts going down to a significant margin and as a result people start only having children when they want and as a result that drags the abortion rate significantly down while birth rates are going up then all those political shitstorms about sex will be gone.

Tl:dr; if teenage pregnancy is down and abortions are down cause people are waiting to have children then those political shitstorms are going bye bye.



What is probably going to change society drastically in a couple years is that long term birth control pills are being worked on now.  If a woman only needs to take one birth control pill every say six months to a year then as a result abortion rates and unplanned pregnancy will fall through the fucking floor.  Imagine women being able to take one pill that costs the same and as a result they don't have to worry about getting pregnant for a year.
